content: Did something changes with the debug-assertions entry in config.toml change in the last 6 months? I can't get debug! output anymore with RUST_LOG=debug build/x86*/stage1/bin/rustc foo.rs
We should realistically be emitting a single message I feel on startup if we detect RUST_LOG for our crates
I imagine that wouldn't be too hard to implement, but I don't really know how env_logger et all work.
